ing: 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, drained and liquid reserved
des: "My husband hates refried beans. Instead of giving up on one of my favorite foods, I sought to change his opinion. Well, I did and he requests them now!"
ins:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Mix black beans, refried black beans, 1/2 of the reserved liquid, Mexican cheese, and garlic together in an 8-inch baking dish.
Bake in the preheated oven until bubbling, about 30 minutes.
